wikipedia_page.main: Irvine Campbell Geddes (9 July 1882 – 18 May 1962)  was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped six times between 1906-8 for Scotland and captained Scotland in the 1908 Calcutta Cup match. He also played for London Scottish FC.He was the father of Keith Geddes, who was also capped for Scotland.

response: Keith Irvine Geddes (25 October 1918 – 30 March 1991) was a Scottish rugby union player.Bath, p139.
He was the son of Irvine Geddes, who was also capped for Scotland and who also captained Scotland, in the Calcutta Cup match of 1908.Griffiths, p2:15

response: *Irvine Geddes and Keith Geddes; Irvine was Keith's father
